content.user_title: Analyze Network Traffic Patterns and Bandwidth
content.value_statement: Network administrators struggle to identify bandwidth bottlenecks and application usage without deep visibility. This skill provides DPI-based traffic classification and bandwidth analysis to optimize network performance and plan capacity.
actual_capabilities: Identify applications in use with DPI classification
Analyze bandwidth usage by client and application
Identify heavy users and bandwidth-intensive applications
Recommend traffic optimization and QoS policies
Track traffic patterns and trends over time
limitations: Requires UniFi Network API access credentials
Limited to networks using UniFi infrastructure
Historical data availability depends on controller retention settings

use_cases.title: Bandwidth Troubleshooting
use_cases.description: Identify which applications or clients are consuming excessive bandwidth and causing network congestion.

use_cases.title: Capacity Planning
use_cases.description: Analyze traffic trends to plan bandwidth upgrades and justify infrastructure investments.

use_cases.title: Policy Optimization
use_cases.description: Configure QoS policies based on actual application usage patterns and traffic priorities.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Traffic Overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the current bandwidth usage and identify the top 10 bandwidth-consuming clients on the network.
prompt_templates.scenario: Get a quick summary of network bandwidth consumption

prompt_templates.title: Application Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: What applications are using the most bandwidth? Break down traffic by DPI category.
prompt_templates.scenario: Understand what types of traffic dominate the network

prompt_templates.title: Congestion Investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze the network for congestion. Which clients and applications are causing the most strain?

prompt_templates.title: QoS Recommendations
prompt_templates.prompt: Based on current traffic patterns, recommend QoS policies to prioritize critical applications.

best_practices: Monitor traffic patterns regularly to establish baseline usage
Correlate DPI categories with application policies for effective QoS
Use traffic data to justify bandwidth upgrades to stakeholders
anti_patterns: Ignoring historical trends and only reacting to immediate issues
Setting QoS rules without first understanding actual traffic patterns
Failing to document traffic policies and rationale for future reference

faq.question: What is DPI classification?
faq.answer: DPI (Deep Packet Inspection) examines network traffic beyond port numbers to identify actual applications and services based on packet content.

faq.question: Which UniFi devices are supported?
faq.answer: Any UniFi device managed by a UniFi Network Controller with API access enabled is supported.

faq.question: Can this skill block traffic?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides read-only analysis. It can recommend policies but cannot modify network configuration.

faq.question: How historical data does it access?
faq.answer: Historical data depends on your UniFi Controller retention settings. The skill accesses what the API provides.

faq.question: Is real-time monitoring available?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill can query current bandwidth metrics and traffic classifications in real-time through the API.

faq.question: What credentials are required?
faq.answer: UniFi Network Controller credentials with API access. The skill requires read-only network monitoring permissions.
